I didn't believe the rumors at first, but our scouts have confirmed it. Virkan is back.

Thulsa's necromancy brought back Virkan the Slayer, and he wanders the halls of the furnace even now. Just as he did in life, when he wandered Shara, searching for a worthy opponent.

Virkan disappeared when our whole continent had no one worthy to face him. And now he's back. And probably looking for you.

Virkan himself called you "worthy one."

I'd save praise like that for your tombstone, .
